page.title: 05Waterthorpe Shopping Centre
page.content: A large shopping complex is planned in an area between Waterthorpe and Beighton. The development is a joint venture between Sheffield City Council and Chesterfield Properties. The planned amenities include: {2 supermarkets 2 department stores { 60 small shops 1 indoor market { 1 Post Office 2 public houses { 1 library recreational areas { showrooms 1 garden centre { council offices a bus station { a petrol station} The area has needed these facilities for a long time and people in the area cannot wait for the development to be completed. { }At the moment no work has started on the site; it is still in the planning stage. { {
